content.question: Which of the following calculation methods would determine the percent change in the crude birth rate from 1994 to 2019 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 17.6 minus 11.9, close parenthesis, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>17.6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>11.9</mn><mo>)</mo><mtext> </mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>100</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 11.9 minus 17.6 and denominator 17.6, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>11.9</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>17.6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>17.6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 17.6 plus 11.9 and denominator 17.6, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>17.6</mn><mtext> </mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>11.9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>17.6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 11.9 over 17.6, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>11.9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>17.6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext> </mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext> 100 </mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 11.9 minus 17.6 and denominator 17.6, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>11.9</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>17.6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>17.6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Determine an approach or method aligned with the problem to be solved.
